name: GlyphRunner
description: Visualizes memory changes as animated symbolic patterns
prompt: Convert memory diffs to symbolic animations using fractal patterns and rune-like glyphs

name: SnapMap
prompt: Generate interactive graph visualizations from MemorySnapshot linkages

name: EchoLens
prompt: Create interactive timeline of agent activities with reflection prompts

name: TokenWeaver
description: Token usage monitor and fallback system
prompt: Track and visualize token usage across agents, trigger model fallbacks
